event.description:
Regenerate, in association with the Summer House Cafe presents 'For the Record' - A property that intends to preach and push the revival of the culture of Vinyl Records. 

The night throws light on music released by artists, some of whom are far from mainstream social media and prefer to release music incognito. 

For our first edition , Bhish ( Regenerate ) and Pramod Sippy take over turntable 

So join us and discover the unexplored! 

RSVP : https://goo.gl/ss8QWS
.............................................................................................................
event.title: Regenerate & Summer House Cafe Present : For The Record

event.description:
Line Up: Murthovic + Burudu (DJ Set) + Kaleekarma / कलीकर्मा
Date: 22nd April 2017
Time: 9pm onwards
Entry: Free
**In association with Gently Altered and WAVLNGTH**

About Murthovic
If some day in the future, if someone were to study the evolution of electronic music in Hyderabad, Murthovic’s contribution as one of the chief influencers will never go unnoticed. 

Author, fuser, educator, creator - Murthovic has over a decade's experience in the industry. His abiding passion has seen him evolve his own celebrated brand of music, a variant of tech-house, progressive and techno with influences found in the rhythmic beats of soul, funk, disco and crossover sounds.

Read more: https://www.redbull.com/in-en/field-trip-tracing-the-journey-of-dj-murthovic
event.title: UnMute Presents: Murthovic, Burudu & Kaleekarma

event.description:
Salsa India & Pronto Presents

AFRO LATIN NIGHT
Every Sunday at Summer House Cafe Mumbai.

Hosted by Performanza Dance Academy.

Free Entry to all.
Dress Code: Smart Casual

Supported by Kizomba India and all the Schools in Mumbai.

Digital Partner: Uma Chhabria

Festival Partners:
Dance Camp - World Wide
Istanbul Int. Dance Festival
Kazan Int. Dance Festival
The Sensual Festival - Berlin.
****************************************************

It all began with Salsa Sundays at Zenzi Bandra back in the days with Salsa India.

Now Salsa India and Pronto promices to bring back the same culture and unity of Latin Dance in Mumbai once again.

Afro Latin Nights will be a common ground for all Schools and Societies in Mumbai to promote themselves.

Kaytee will be Djing the first 3 Sundays of February with some of the latest in Salsa, Mambo, Bachata, Kizomba, Semba tracks played in Europe followed by DJ.
event.title: Salsa India and Pronto in association with Summer House Cafe Presents Afro Latin Night
